text: Luca Lotti (born 20 June 1982) is an Italian politician. He was the Minister for Sport from 2016 to 2018. In 2013, he was elected in the Italian general election to the Chamber of Deputies; from 28 February 2014, he was Undersecretary to the Presidency of the Council.Chi Ã¨ Luca Lotti, nuovo ministro dello Sport He was also secretary of the interministerial Committee for economic planning.DECRETO DEL PRESIDENTE DEL CONSIGLIO DEI MINISTRI 25 febbraio 2016 From 2016 to 2018, he was the Minister for Sport in the Gentiloni Cabinet.
